title: Drawing, "Design for the Cresting on the Back of a Coach", 1833–40
medium: Graphite on off-white machine made laid paper
markings:
watermark: coat of arms and framed portrait of Pope Gregory XVI; 
below: GVIDO PANTINI S. ANATOLIA 1833
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Lightly drawn image of a cornucopia and a putto, supporting a wreath with his right hand. The rinceaux have the form of a cresting board framing the sides. Below the garland is written: "Carrozza." Two escutcheons are sketched.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for the Cresting on the Back of a Coach", 1833–40.
1833–40. Graphite on off-white machine made laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-5374.
